verses.roman:
ye yathā māṁ prapadyante
tāṁs tathaiva bhajāmy aham
mama vartmānuvartante
manuṣyāḥ pārtha sarvaśaḥ

synonyms: ye—they; yathā—as; mām—unto Me; prapadyante—surrender; tān—unto them; tathā eva—in the same proportion; bhajāmi—bestow My favor; aham—I; mama—My; vartma—way; anuvartante—follow; manuṣyāḥ—men; pārtha—My dear Arjuna; sarvaśaḥ—in all respects.
translation: "According to Lord Kṛṣṇa in the Bhagavad-gītā [4.11],'As all surrender unto Me, I reward them accordingly. Everyone follows My path in all respects, O son of Pṛthā.'
